query.mssql: SELECT Sungero_Company_JobTitle.Name as JobTitle, Sungero_Core_Recipient.Name as Employee, dep.Name as Department, businessUnit.Name as BusinessUnit, doc.Name as DocumentName, SignatureType as SignedResult, case SignatureType when 0 then 'Согласовано' when 1 then 'Утверждено' end as SignRes, SigningDate as SigningDate, EntityId as DocumentId, Sungero_Core_Recipient.Id as EmpId FROM Sungero_Core_Sign LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient ON Sungero_Core_Sign.Signatory = Sungero_Core_Recipient.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc doc ON Sungero_Core_Sign.EntityId = doc.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Company_JobTitle ON Sungero_Company_JobTitle.Id = Sungero_Core_Recipient.JobTitle_Company_Sungero LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient dep ON dep.Id = Sungero_Core_Recipient.Department_Company_Sungero LEFT JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc docNOR ON docNOR.BusinessUnit_Docflow_Sungero = Sungero_Core_Recipient.Parent LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient businessUnit ON businessUnit.Id = dep.Parent where Sungero_Core_Recipient.Id in (select value from string_split(@RecipientsIds, ',')) and SigningDate >= @StartDate and SigningDate <= @EndDate;
